attributes.action: make apprenticships as part of any companies contract with public departments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is to ensure the skills base of the uk for the future .
I propose that any company tendering for any government contract will have to have in place a valid and tracable apprenticeship scheme for the young of this country ,with tax breaks for each apprentice taken on by them.
The tax break would only come into force when the said apprentice reaches various stages of training to prevent misuse of the system.
